sent.orig: No word in the English language rhymes with "MONTH."
sent.trans: 英语里面没有词可以和month压韵。

sent.orig: It'll be Molotov cocktails this month, hand grenades next month, and something else next month.
sent.trans: 这个月将要开始用燃烧弹，下个月就用手榴弹和别的东西。

sent.orig: You can choose one kind from three-month, six-month, twelve-month and two-year maturities.
sent.trans: 你可在三个月、半年、一年和两年期中选择一种。

sent.orig: There are three kinds of fixed deposits, sir. Three-month, six-month and twelve-month deposits.
sent.trans: 有三种定期存款，先生。三个月期、六个月期及一年期。

sent.orig: D CG image of seven-month-old month fetus in the womb.
sent.trans: 3维计算机成像，显示子宫中一个7个月的胎儿。
